name: Box (itch) (chisenoa)
description:
Greetings!

Box is a sokoban game where you try to solve puzzles by pushing boxes while a rocket is falling from the hill

Does It Have a Story?

No, but you're pushing boxes, dude don't you think that's cool?

This game was made in 72 hours with Delay the inevitable theme for Ludum Dare 50 hosted by Ludum Dare

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys
Don't forget to save your ass from missiles

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to sokoban games
• Remastered pixel slime character
• Companies that will sue me for copyright due to the musics in the game
• My friends who are curious about the game i made (I don't have friends)

System Requirements

You can even play on a Box

Credits

Alperen Güner - Game Designer
Alperen Güner - Programmer
Alperen Güner - Pixel Artist
Alperen Güner - Sound Designer
Alperen Güner - Project Manager

Tyler Durden - Psychological Support
